title: Bug 120315: Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When setting the display property of an item to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label associated with the item is still visible.
EB: In the PDF preview, the label should disappear when the display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
1. Open the document in the new PDF emitter.
2. Locate the item with the label.
3. Set the display property of the item to 'none'.
4. Preview the document in PDF format.
5. Verify that the label is not visible.
